item.title: The Best Online Multiplayer Game?
item.dc:creator: @ionfreek458 ionfreek458
item.description:
@ionfreek458 wrote:

hey whenever i join a sever, im the only one in it. i played mopar when it first came out and there where lots of ppl everywhere and we started at edgvile and clicked on portals to gain lvls. idk what happened, but one day the game didnt work anymore and it wasnt my compy. please tell me whats going on and how to get on to servers wit lots of ppl and crazy pking and lag. :mad: :mad: :eek: :mad:
